description: This file defines the 'Note' entity class used for persistence, encapsulating properties like id, title, content, and timestamps, with annotations for ORM mapping.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Entity class representing a note with fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, with lifecycle callback methods for timestamp management.

methods.name: Note()
methods.description: Default constructor for the Note entity.

methods.name: Note(String title, String content)
methods.description: Constructor to create a new Note with specified title and content.

methods.name: onCreate()
methods.description: Callback method executed before the entity is persisted; sets creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: onUpdate()
methods.description: Callback method executed before the entity is updated; updates the 'updatedAt' timestamp.

methods.name: getId()
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: getTitle()
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle(String title)
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent()
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent(String content)
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: getCreatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the note was created.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt()
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the note was last updated.
